lead_paragraph: Absent a time machine outfitted with extra-long, lie-flat beds — because that's how NBA teams roll — we'll never know whether these Golden State Warriors are as good or better than the 1995-96 Chicago Bulls.

headline.main: Column: Vintage MJ-Led Bulls Would Top Curry's Warriors
headline.print_headline: Column: Vintage MJ-Led Bulls Would Top Curry's Warriors

snippet: Absent a time machine outfitted with extra-long, lie-flat beds — because that's how NBA teams roll — we'll never know whether these Golden State Warriors are as good or better than the 1995-96 Chicago Bulls....
